title: Jay Gatsby
description: If personality is an unbroken series of successful gestures, then there was something gorgeous about him, some heightened senstivity to the promises of life, as if he were related to one of those intricate machines that register earthquakes ten thousand miles away.

title: Daisy Buchanan
description: Her eyes fell on Jordan and me with a sort of appeal, as though she realized at last what she was doing - and as though she had never, all along, intended doing anything at all.

title: Anthony Cade
description: If there’s any trouble brewing, Anthony Cade is sure to be in it sooner or later, I know that. You’ve an absolute instinct for rows—and the nine lives of a cat.

title: Virginia Revel
description: We need some one with savoir faire, poise, knowledge of the world—Ah, of course, the very person. My cousin Virginia.

title: Sleepy Time Gal
source: w. Joseph R. Alden & Raymond B. Egan m. Ange Lorenzo & Richard A. Whiting

title: Ditched
description: In the ditch beside the road, right side up but violently shorn of one wheel, rested a new coupe which had left Gatsby's drive not two minutes before.
effect: Choose one of your active guests to make a drunken, vehicular exit from the party.

title: Pistol
description: Anthony took out his handkerchief and wound it round his hand, then hepicked up the pistol.
effect: Player may kill the Active Guest of any other Player.

title: Orderi di Danilo
description: Then came the war, old sport. It was a great relief and I tried very hard to die but I seemed to bear an enchanted life.
effect: You're famous for cheating death. Ignore the next scenario to kill one of your active guests.
